General.Name: Aba Chemicals Corp
General.Description: ABA Chemicals Corporation engages in the research and development, and production of plant protection, pharmaceutical intermediates, and nutritional and health products worldwide. The company offers plant protection products, such as plant growth regulator, herbicides, insecticide, and bactericide; pharmaceutical products, including pesticide and pharmaceutical intermediates; and nutrition products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Taicang, China.
